title: The Dead Beat
author: Johnstone, Doug
snippet: One of those occasional Scottish spring evenings, bursting with possibilities for the summer, promises that were never fulfilled. The light was making the leaves on the trees across in Figgate Park shimmer.

title: The Dead Beat
author: Johnstone, Doug
snippet: The boy had no sense of nature. They walked the extra distance through Figgate Park. It was unlit, and they stumbled round the pond to the boardwalk.
